      • getLatestVersion

        public java.lang.String getLatestVersion()
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Checks the latest version of this resource. This makes a web request and should not be called on the Bukkit main thread!
        Returns:
        the latest version of this resource
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getLatestUpdate

        public Update getLatestUpdate()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the latest update. Includes the version, name, and description of the update.
        Returns:
        the latest update.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • isOldVersion

        public boolean isOldVersion()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Checks if you are running an old version of the plugin. This should not be run on the Bukkit main thread.
        Returns:
        true if you should update, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        isOldVersion(String)

      • isOldVersion

        public boolean isOldVersion(java.lang.String version)
        Like isOldVersion() but uses version as the latest version. This should not be run on the Bukkit main thread.
        Returns:
        true if you should update, false otherwise
        See Also:
        isOldVersion()

      • updateIfOld

        public Update updateIfOld()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Download the latest version of the plugin and place it in. the /plugins/update directory. This should not be run on the Bukkit main thread.
        Returns:
        the update downloaded if any was downloaded, or null otherwise or if the file already exists.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • schedule

        public void schedule(long delay,
                     java.util.function.Consumer<Update> callback,
                     boolean stopWhenUpdateFound)
        Run updateIfOld() every delay ticks asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        delay - How often to schedule an update
        callback - This will be run asynchronously if a new version is downloaded.

      • schedule

        public void schedule(long delay,
                     boolean stopWhenUpdateFound)
        Executes schedule(long, Consumer, boolean) and does nothing when an update is downloaded.
        See Also:
        schedule(long, Consumer, boolean)
